column1: * Last meeting of the [[White Council]]. They debate the [[Rings of Power]]. [[Saruman]] feigns that he has discovered that [[the One Ring]] has passed down [[Anduin]] to [[Belegaer
column2: the Sea]]. Saruman withdraws to [[Isengard]], which he takes as his own, and fortifies it. Being jealous and afraid of [[Gandalf]] he sets spies to watch all his movements; and notes his interest in [[the Shire]]. He soon begins to keep agents in [[Bree]] and the [[Southfarthing]].<ref>{{App

column1: *[[Ecthelion II]], son of Turgon, becomes the twenty-fifth Ruling Steward.<ref name="South"/>
* [[Thengel]], son of Fengel, becomes the sixteenth King of [[Rohan]].<ref name="Mark"/>
